contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=June 2013}} {{Use dmy dates|date=November 2012}} {{Infobox station |name=<!-- Deleted image removed: [[File:Translinkcorner.png|16px|left|link=TransLink (South East Queensland)]] -->Yeronga |image=Yeronga Railway Station, Queensland, July 2012.JPG |style = TransLink (SEQ) |smartcardname = [[go card]] | address= Fairfield Road, [[Yeronga, Queensland|Yeronga]] | coordinates={{coord|-27.5179|153.0169|format=dms|type:railwaystation_region:AU-QLD|display=inline,title}} | line= {{rail color box|system=QR|line=Beenleigh}} | platform= 2 [[side platform]]s | tracks = 2 | parking= 167 | bicycle= No | opened= | rebuilt= | ADA= | code=600053 (platform 1)<br /> 600195 (platform 2) | owned= [[Queensland Rail]] | zone=2 | services= {{s-rail|title=QR}} {{s-line|system=QR|line=Beenleigh|previous=Fairfield|next=Yeerongpilly}} }} '''Yeronga''' is a [[railway station]] on the [[Beenleigh railway line|Beenleigh Line]] of [[Brisbane]], [[Australia]]. It is part of the [[Queensland Rail]] City network. It is in Zone 2 of the [[TransLink (South East Queensland)|TransLink]] integrated public transport system. ==Services by platform== {{Citytrain Platforms| p1name=1| p1linename=[[Beenleigh railway line|<span style="color:red;">'''Beenleigh'''</span>]]<br>[[Tennyson railway line|<span style="color:red;">'''Corinda'''</span>]]| p1destname=[[Beenleigh railway station|<span style="color:red;">'''Beenleigh'''</span>]]<br>[[Corinda railway station|<span style="color:#006400;">'''Corinda'''</span>]] & [[Darra railway station|<span style="color:#006400;">'''Darra'''</span>]]|p1notes=All stations<br>All stations (Peak hour only)| p2name=2| p2linename=[[Ferny Grove railway line|<span style="color:red;">'''Ferny Grove'''</span>]]<br>[[Tennyson railway line|<span style="color:red;">'''Corinda'''</span>]]| p2destname=[[Bowen Hills railway station|<span style="color:dodgerblue;">'''City'''</span>]] & [[Ferny Grove railway station|<span style="color:red;">'''Ferny Grove'''</span>]]<br>[[Bowen Hills railway station|<span style="color:dodgerblue;">'''City'''</span>]]|p2notes=All stations<br>All stations (Peak hour only)| }} ==See also== *[[List of South East Queensland railway stations]] ==External links== *[http://www.transinfo.com.au TransInfo] *[http://www.citytrain.com.au Citytrain] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20090109051340/http://qroti.com/placeinfo/qld/rail/yeronga/ Yeronga Station at QROTI] {{Navbox TransLink (SEQ) train network - Beenleigh line}} [[Category:Railway stations in Brisbane]] {{Australia-rail-transport-stub}}
